skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.localised_description: Black Orcs are some of the best fighters in the known world. Yet, these boyz can still learn some tricks from their warboss.

skillTree.localised_description: The Orcs are the only race which LIVES for war. And nothing inspires the boyz more than fighting side by side with their blood-drenched warboss.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Lust for Battle"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.localised_description: Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

factionEffects.localised_description: "Bane of the Dawi-Zharr", "Black Jaw", "Scourge of the Dark Lands" – those are just a few titles of the hulking brute named Gormok that calls the Dark Lands his home and enjoys spending time at his forge just as much as bashing stunties.
